name: scraparr
description: Scraparr is a self-hosted tool to scrape and sync metadata for media libraries. It integrates with Radarr/Sonarr and enriches content automatically.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Automatically fetches and updates metadata for movies and TV shows

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Syncs with Radarr to enrich movie libraries with enhanced metadata

features.title: Sonarr Integration
features.description: Connects to Sonarr for TV series metadata enrichment and updates

features.title: Multiple Sources
features.description: Aggregates data from TMDB, TVDB, and other metadata providers

features.title: Poster Management
features.description: Downloads and organizes high-quality posters and artwork

features.title: Batch Processing
features.description: Processes entire libraries efficiently with configurable batch sizes

features.title: Custom Mappings
features.description: Override automatic matches with manual metadata assignments

features.title: Scheduling
features.description: Runs metadata updates on configurable schedules to keep libraries current
